categories: Category:Ships of the Open Circle Fleet

nodes.text: The Liberty was a Venator-class Star Destroyer of the Galactic Republic naval forces' Open Circle Fleet, which served as the flagship of Jedi General Aayla Secura and her Republic task force during the Clone Wars. In 21 BBY, the Liberty, alongside Secura's task force of two other Venators, engaged a Separatist fleet above the planet Quell, where it was destroyed under heavy fire by several Munificent-class star frigates, but not before Secura escaped the vessel with the help of fellow Jedi Anakin Skywalker.

As a Venator-class Star Destroyer, the Liberty had two bridges that were painted red to signify its position as a flagship, as well a ventral hangar large enough to dock with a Consular-class cruiser. The Star Destroyer was also equipped with several engine units and a deflector shield, and was armed with eight DBY-827 heavy turbolaser turrets (four port, four starboard) and two medium dual turbolaser cannons (one port, one starboard). Either side of the ship's hull featured the emblem of the Open Circle Fleet.

During the Battle of Quell the Star Destroyer Liberty was attacked by several Munificent-class star frigates and heavily damaged. The fleet called for help from Anakin Skywalker and Admiral Wullf Yularen, who arrived in the Resolute shortly after. Three LAAT/i gunships were dispatched from the Resolute to extract all personnel from the Star Destroyer. However, the separatist tactical droid ordered to destroy the Galactic Republic flagship. By closing the blast doors around him, Skywalker sacrificed himself to save his companions from the explosions. Jedi General Aayla Secura and Skywalker's Padawan Ahsoka Tano were able to drag him onboard a Consular-class cruiser before the Republic starship was destroyed.

The Liberty first appeared in "Jedi Crash," the thirteenth episode of the first season of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series, which aired on January 16, 2009. It was later first identified in the 2021 reference book Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Character Encyclopedia - Join the Battle!, authored by Jason Fry.
